an8.50:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, ayaṁsa loko āraddho hoti.
an8.50:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo susaṁvihitakammanto hoti, saṅgahitaparijano, bhattu manāpaṁ carati, sambhataṁ anurakkhati.
an8.50:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo ye te bhattu abbhantarā kammantā …pe…
an8.50:2.3: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo susaṁvihitakammanto hoti.
an8.50:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano …pe…
an8.50:3.3: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saṅgahitaparijano hoti.
an8.50:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo bhattu manāpaṁ carati?
an8.50:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo yaṁ bhattu amanāpasaṅkhātaṁ taṁ jīvitahetupi na ajjhācarati.
an8.50:4.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo bhattu manāpaṁ carati.
an8.50:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo yaṁ bhattā āharati …pe…
an8.50:5.3: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo sambhataṁ anurakkhati.
an8.50:5.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, ayaṁsa loko āraddho hoti.
an8.50:6.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo paralokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, paraloko āraddho hoti.
an8.50:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saddhāsampanno hoti, sīlasampanno hoti, cāgasampanno hoti, paññāsampanno hoti.
an8.50:7.3: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo saddhāsampanno hoti.
an8.50:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti …pe…
an8.50:8.4: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo sīlasampanno hoti.
an8.50:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mātugāmo vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṁ ajjhāvasati …pe…
an8.50:9.3: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo cāgasampanno hoti.
an8.50:10.3: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, mātugāmo paññāsampanno hoti.
an8.50:10.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo paralokavijayāya paṭipanno hoti, paraloko āraddho hotīti.
